# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(SimV2_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(SimV2)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
SimV2PluginInfo.C
SimV2CommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
SimV2PluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
SimV2MDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtSimV2FileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
SimV2EnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtSimV2FileFormat.C
avtSimV2Writer.C
SimV2GetMesh.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/sim/V2/lib
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/sim/V2/runtime
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${ICET_LIBRARY_DIR} ${AVT_REQUIRED_LIB_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(ISimV2Database ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ISimV2Database visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ISimV2Database)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MSimV2Database ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MSimV2Database visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MSimV2Database MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MSimV2Database)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ESimV2Database_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESimV2Database_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser simV2runtime_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ESimV2Database_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESimV2Database_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ESimV2Database_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESimV2Database_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par simV2runtime_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ESimV2Database_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESimV2Database_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases SimV2 ${INSTALLTARGETS})
